thread.title: Jenonia Lomas
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Jenonia Lomas

author: Jenonia Lomas
title: Jenonia Lomas
text: This company not only has beautiful puzzles, just as importantly, they have great customer service. Their concern for customer satisfaction along with all the great specials they offfer will keep me coming back for more. Loved the fact that they gave (for customers on their mailing list) the opportunity to vote on new puzzles. I sent their website to my sisters and mother-in-law, all puzzles lovers. Love this company!
